name: Huge Axe
description: It takes some time to adjust to its weight while using it.

name: Huge Axe [2]
description: It takes some time to adjust to its weight while using it.

name: Hurricane Controlling Alloy
description: Increases wind M.Dmg/Dmg by 15% for 6 min. Becomes immune to 1 of the 4 immune alloys for 10 min: Fire/Ice/Hurricane/Earth. Cannot work with 4 mastery alloys.

name: Hurricane Fury [1]
description: The giant Two-Handed Axe in the shape of hurricane. The center of the axe holds hurricane Str. The stronger the weapon, the stronger the Str.

name: Hurricane Fury [2]
description: The giant Two-Handed Axe in the shape of hurricane. The center of the axe holds hurricane Str. The stronger the weapon, the stronger the Str.

name: Hurricane Immunity Alloy
description: Immune to all Wind Damage for 1 min. Becomes immune to 1 of the 4 immune alloys for 5 min: Fire/Ice/Hurricane/Earth.

name: Hurricane Mastery Alloy
description: Increases wind M.Dmg/Dmg by 5% for 30 min. Cannot work with Fire/Ice/Earth Mastery Alloy. Cannot work with 4 mastery alloys.

name: Hurricane Resist Alloy
description: Reduces hurricane damage by 50% for 5min. Cannot work with Ice/Earth/Fire Alloy effects.

name: Hyacinth Light Camel
description: Use to redeem job Costume Hyacinth Light Camel at "Prontera" Costume shop

name: Hydra
description: Legend has it that after Hercules has killed Hydra, he made the sea monster's head into a trophy to prevent its rebirth.

name: Hydra Blueprint
description: Legend has it that after Hercules has killed Hydra, he made the sea monster's head into a trophy to prevent its rebirth.

name: Hydrangea Hairpin
description: Dear player, Today is your fiftieth time of falling in love this year. On this wonderful day, Let me give you this headpiece made of blue sun flowers. (thank you very much for your purchase. This beautiful ornament is unavailable on the exchange during the activity, the transaction will be normal after the period. By Ina, July 2017.)

name: Hyegun Hat
description: Monster Hyegun's hat. Broken but with strong Def.

name: Hyegun Hat [1]
description: Monster Hyegun's hat. Broken but with strong Def.
